title: Developer's word
content:
If you think this application is helpful to you, please rate me or share it with your friends, your evaluation and sharing are my motivation for updating.

App 1.2.6 update content

1.Support batch download of stories, IGTV, posts

2.Supports download posts, IGTV, stories, profile, highlights URL and more from Instagram

4.Support for download privacy account content

5.The most comprehensive Instagram saver

Use tutorial

Simple to use

Batch download posts, IGTV, stories

Update to the latest version

1.You can click theOK buttonto enter Google Play Update

2.You can click theGoogle Playto update
